name: Popupbox
body:
### PopupBox on jQuery, works in ie7+, centering content with pure css. To use it in your page, include this files, : ``` ``` Then in your js files, init plugin on link click with: ``` $("#simplelink").popupbox({ //overlay: false }); ``` ### Plugin will show content in element link is referring to. Sample: ``` Show popup!
